title: Certificates and Compliance
meta_description: The provision of software, hardware, cybersecurity applicartion - and maintenance from a single source guarantees unparalleled reliability, security and efficiency. We partnered with Phoenix Technologies, which infrastructure complies with ISO 27001 and is audited according to ISAE 3402.
main_content: Certifications and Compliance The provision of software, hardware, cybersecurity applicartion - and maintenance from a single source guarantees unparalleled reliability, security and efficiency. We partnered with Phoenix Technologies, which infrastructure complies with ISO 27001 and is audited according to ISAE 3402. More about Phoenix Technologies Download  (undefined, 0 B) ISO 27001 We have implemented quality management processes for information security based on the international standard ISO 27001. This ensures the highest level of security for all assets we own. Download Certificate Download Certificate ISO 27001, Phoenix Technologies AG (1).pdf (application/pdf, 338 B) ISAE 3402 Type II ISAE 3402 type 2 compliance means that we consistently deliver AI-cloud and confidential cloud solutions that meet the highest standards of security, data privacy, and compliance in Switzerland. Download Certificate Download Phoenix Systems ISAE 3402 Type 2 2023 (1).pdf (application/pdf, 1.22 kB) Contact us and let us know your requirements. It may be covered by other certifications or regulations we comply to. We have implemented quality management processes for information security based on the international standard ISO 27001. This ensures the highest level of security for all assets we own.
ISAE 3402 type 2 compliance means that we consistently deliver AI-cloud and confidential cloud solutions that meet the highest standards of security, data privacy, and compliance in Switzerland.
